SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.layouts

Class Layout

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.layouts.Layout
Direct Known Subclasses:
Corners, Diagonal, FullLine, Group, ItemsPerColor, Square, Stair, XShape
public abstract class Layout extends Object
The disposition of the items in a common goal whose position has to be matched in the bookshelf.

    • Layout

      public Layout(int width, int height, int minDifferent, int maxDifferent) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This constructor creates a layout.
      Parameters:
      width - the width of the layout
      height - the height of the layout
      minDifferent - the minimum number of different colors in the layout
      maxDifferent - the maximum number of different colors in the layout
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters are invalid

      public boolean isHorizontal()
      This method indicates whether the layout is horizontal or not.
      Returns:
      true if the layout is horizontal, false is the default value

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      public int getDifferentColors(List<Item> itemList) throws IllegalArgumentException
